mapper.select: select * from gb_department_dis_goods as gddg left join gb_distributer_alias as gda on gda.gb_DA_dis_goods_id = gddg.gb_DDG_dis_goods_id left join gb_distributer_standard as gds on gds.gb_DS_dis_goods_id = gddg.gb_DDG_dis_goods_id left join gb_department as gd on gd.gb_department_id = gddg.gb_DDG_gb_department_id left join nx_distributer as nd on nd.nx_distributer_id = gddg.gb_DDG_nx_distributer_goods_id left join nx_distributer_goods as ndg on ndg.nx_distributer_goods_id = gddg.gb_DDG_nx_distributer_goods_id where gb_department_dis_goods_id = #{value}

select gg.gb_distributer_father_goods_id 'gg_gb_distributer_father_goods_id', gg.gb_dfg_fathers_father_id 'gg_gb_dfg_fathers_father_id', gg.gb_dfg_father_goods_name 'gg_gb_dfg_father_goods_name', g.gb_distributer_father_goods_id 'g_gb_distributer_father_goods_id', g.gb_dfg_fathers_father_id 'g_gb_dfg_fathers_father_id', g.gb_dfg_father_goods_name 'g_gb_dfg_father_goods_name', f.gb_distributer_father_goods_id 'f_gb_distributer_father_goods_id', f.gb_dfg_fathers_father_id 'f_gb_dfg_fathers_father_id', f.gb_dfg_father_goods_name 'f_gb_dfg_father_goods_name' from gb_department_dis_goods as ddg left join gb_distributer_goods as dg on dg.gb_distributer_goods_id = ddg.gb_DDG_dis_goods_id left join gb_distributer_father_goods as f on f.gb_distributer_father_goods_id = dg.gb_dg_dfg_goods_father_id left join gb_distributer_father_goods as g on g.gb_distributer_father_goods_id = f.gb_dfg_fathers_father_id left join gb_distributer_father_goods as gg on gg.gb_distributer_father_goods_id = g.gb_dfg_fathers_father_id where ddg.gb_DDG_department_father_id = #{depFatherId}
mapper.delete:
delete from gb_department_dis_goods where gb_department_dis_goods_id in
#{gbDepartmentDisGoodsId}
